name: Weapon Proficiency
description: Be able to use a weapon well, reduces thac0 by 1 when using the weapon. You may select one weapon category when taking this skill but you may take this skill multiple times to have multiple proficiencies. Write your weapon category instead of just weapon proficiency when taking this skill. Ex. Sword Proficiency.

name: Hey I Like That Guy
description: People generally enjoy your presence and have less suspicion towards you.

name: Unnoticeable
description: Allows you to sneak past enemies and prevent yourself from being detected.

name: Deception
description: Prevents people from reading your face and helps you hide the truth when lying.

name: Persuasion
description: Improves your ability to influence people to complete an action or give information.

name: Walk Like I Own The Place
description: Walk with authority, avoiding suspicion and reducing the chance that someone will question your presence.

name: Comprehend Languages
description: Understand any spoken language.

name: Pick Pocket
description: Steal an item from someone's pocket.

name: Master Pick Pocket
description: Steal an item from someone's pocket, hand, or even losely fit clothing.

name: Detect Trap
description: Detects a trap in the immediate area.

name: Detect Treasure
description: Detects treasure in the immediate area.

name: Pass Without Trace
description: Improves stealth and allows you to move without any trace, preventing tracking.

name: Improved Ambush Initiative
description: Increase ambush initiative from 5 to 6.

name: Picklock
description: Allows you to pick open locks.

name: Backstab
description: Instantly kill any creature 100 health or below. If a creature is above 100 health, deal damage equal to the percentage rolled for backstab minus the reduce rogue skill percentage on your target. Improving this skill gives you an extra usage. Failing a backstab gives your target a free attack against you.

name: Incredible Luck
description: Become incredibly lucky on any action you attempt to do or event that happens to you. Maxes at 35%.

name: Use Magic Device
description: Ignore all nonphysical requirements for using any given item. Allows you to use scrolls, wands, and staffs without being a mage.

name: Long Backstab
description: Allows you to backstab with a ranged weapon. Improving this skill increases dex by 1 for this skill.

name: Diplomacy
description: Makes it easier to establish diplomatic relationships, truces, and treaties.

name: Jack of All Trades
description: Be able to use any non-magical and non-combative skill.

name: Uncanny Dodge
description: Dodge an attack. Can be used any number of times in combat.

name: Chain Bacskstab
description: After making a successful backstab kill, make a backstab on a target who has not been backstabed by you this action.

name: Perfect Response
description: The DM tells you what they view to be a perfect solution to an immediate situation. This information does not have to consider to explain future actions.

name: Blindsense
description: You are able to hear anything moving around you and detect its position well enough to attack and dodge. Does not include projectiles.

name: Blindsense Expert
description: Allows you to sense projectiles with blindsense.

name: Forgo Rogue Skill Limit
description: Allows you to improve rogue skills by another 50%.

name: No Quick Death
description: If you are killed by a single attack or spell from full health, survive at 1 health. May be used once per encounter per level on this skill.

name: Elusive
description: Prevents attacks from gaining advantage on you unless you are restrained or incapacitated.

name: Miracle Saving Throw
description: Prevents taking any one-time damage even if it's impossible to avoid by normal means.

name: This Is The Way
description: Know the correct direction to travel inside of a building as long as you know your bearing. i.e. your direction on a compass.

name: Hint Please
description: Get a hint when solving a puzzle.

name: Disarm Trap
description: Automatically disarm any trap that you have detected.

name: Identify Magical Device
description: Identify what a magical item is and how to use it.

name: Anything Goes
description: -1 thac0 when using any non-conventional weapon for melee.

name: Anything Goes Long
description: -1 thac0 when using any ranged non-conventional weapon.

name: Haggling
description: Haggle for better prices when buying or selling items.

name: Appraise
description: Determine the price of an item.

name: Acrobatics
description: Gain advantage when doing parkour, flips, and tricks.

name: Swimming
description: Gain advantage when rolling for swimming.

name: Climbing
description: Gain advantage when rolling for climbing.

name: Animal Ecology
description: Identify any animal and facts about them including weaknesses and strengths.

name: Plant Ecology
description: Identify any plant and facts about them including weaknesses and strengths.

name: Monster Ecology
description: Identify any monster and facts about them including weaknesses and strengths.

name: Dragon Ecology
description: Identify any dragon and facts about them including weaknesses and strengths.

name: Extra Skill
description: Gain an extra skill per level.

name: Extra Slot
description: Gain an extra 1/3 of your mana per level. This skill works on the level you take it on.

name: Improved Crit
description: Lowers the required roll to crit on thac0 from 20 to 19.

name: Improved Stat Crit
description: Lowers the required roll to crit on stat rolls by 1.

name: Improved Initiative
description: Adds 1 to your initiative rolls.

name: Devastating Crit
description: Increases your crit multiplier from 2 to 3.

name: Penetrating Crit
description: Your crits an easily pierce through thick armor, stone, and metal

name: Sculpt Spell
description: Slightly change the properties of a spell including shape, casting location by 1ft, and casting delay by 10 seconds.

name: Contingency
description: Allows you to cast a spell that will activate when a certain even occurs. Contingent spells cost 1.5 times your normal cost.

name: Perminancy
description: Allows you to cast a spell that lasts indefinitely. If the spell if a one time use, you may cast it onto a magical item to be used later. For example, a fire ball scroll. Perminancied spells cost 1.5 times their normal value.

name: Two Actions Per Round
description: Take two actions per round of combat, the second round may not be used for a second round of attacks.

name: Long Shot
description: Increase your dex when using a ranged attack by 1.

name: Instant Reload
description: Increases the number of reloads you can make in a round from 1 to 2. i.e. allows you to fire 2 magazines from a gun.

name: Handle Mount
description: Allows you to proficiently ride a mount including vehicles.

name: Tracking
description: You are able to track and identify paths left behind by other creatures.

name: Forage
description: Gather nearby plants and/or locate bodies of water.

name: History
description: Know about the history of your current area or a well known area elsewhere.

name: Intimidation
description: Frighten someone into doing something or giving you information.

name: Iron Stomach
description: Receive no nonmagical deficits from eating harmful food.

name: Lifting
description: You konw how to lift heavy weights to improve your strength.

name: Endurance Training
description: Train your endurance to build up your constitution.

name: Reflex Drills
description: Train your reflexes to increase your dexterity.

name: Meditation
description: Meditate with force beyond our comprehension to increase your wisdom.

name: Memory Recall
description: Practice remembering facts and identifying items to improve your intelligence.

name: Stagecraft
description: Perform for others or tell jokes to increase your charisma. Roleplaying will help this skill especially.

name: Just A Scratch
description: Gain advantage when rolling con at half health.

name: Lightning Reflexes
description: Gain advantage when rolling dex saving throws like dodge.

name: Spot
description: See things far away.

name: Perception
description: Be able to correctly identify small details up close.

name: Dodge
description: Leap out of danger, avoiding all damage. Cannot be an area of effect like a flame thrower. This skill can be used once per combat per level of this skill.

name: Evade Attack
description: Avoid an area of effect attack. This skill can be used once per combat per level of this skill.

name: Deflection
description: Allows you to block or parry a projectile. You get one per encounter per level on this skill.

name: Block
description: Block an attack or area of effect with your shield. This skill can be used once per combat per level of this skill.

name: Parry
description: Block an attack from an enemy with your weapon. This skill can be used once per combat per level of this skill.

name: Max Hit Die
description: Gain the maximum amount of health when leveling up. If you increase your health by d6, increase your health by 6. Improving this skill doubles, then triples the size of your dice. This skill applies on the level you take it.

name: Extra Hit Die
description: Roll an extra dice when increasing your health on level up. This skill applies on the level you take it.

name: Analyze Opponent
description: Identify a target's weaknesses.
